titles.title: To suspend the duty on Aluminum (0.008" and thinner).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
2/12/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend the duty on Aluminum (0.008" and thinner).
